 2024-03642024-04-18
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of SAMUEL THEODORE LOEB of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective May 13, 2024.
